tasks.name: Identify Ping Target
tasks.objective: Clarify the specific target for the ping operation relevant to the repository.
actions: Consult with stakeholders to determine the appropriate target for the ping.
Document the identified target for future reference.
acceptance: Target is clearly defined and agreed upon by stakeholders.
risks: Incorrect target may lead to misleading results.
mitigations: Engage multiple stakeholders to validate the target.

tasks.name: Define Repository Report Requirements
tasks.objective: Establish the format and details required for the repository report based on the ping results.
actions: Gather requirements from users regarding the report's content.
Create a template outlining the structure and necessary details for the report.
acceptance: Report template is approved by users and stakeholders.
risks: Insufficient details in the report may not meet user expectations.
mitigations: Iterate on the report template based on user feedback.

notes: These tasks focus on clarifying the ping target and defining the report requirements to ensure accurate and useful documentation.
